projects.name: Lexpert
projects.skills: .NET 5, HTML, JavaScript, Microsoft SQL Server, SCSS
projects.desc: A renewal project that analyzes and redesign the structure of the lexpert.ca site, which was previously developed based on the .NET Web Forms framework, and then develops it based on the latest framework, .NET 5 Razor Pages.

projects.name: L*******
projects.desc: Development of a website that provides information on employee insurance coverage, insurance claims and information to employees of L*******, a Hong Kong company.

projects.name: i****
projects.desc: Applied new design of intranet site i*** that manages company sales and developed with Vue.js to improve speed. Created an internal library so that the eChart.js library that does not support Vue.js can be used in Vue.js.

projects.name: i*** Improvement to prepare for advanced browser
projects.desc: Compatibility work so that the intranet site i*** that manages company sales can work not only in IE but also in cross browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Edge).

projects.name: H*********
projects.desc: Development of a website that provides information on employee insurance coverage, insurance claims and information to employees of H*********, an Australian company.

projects.name: D*********
projects.desc: Development of a website that provides information on employee insurance coverage, insurance claims and information to employees of D*********, a British company.

projects.name: MCare Mobile Enrollment
projects.desc: Development of a survey module that allows employees to directly select insurance coverage when providing employee insurance among domestic customers.

projects.name: MCare Group/Menu Management
projects.desc: Development of admin menu for MCare, an intranet site that manages insurance claims of employees of domestic customers.

projects.name: Seoul National University Bundang Hospital groupware reconstruction
projects.desc: Changed the existing groupware of Seoul National University Bundang Hospital to KAONi's groupware. Customized mail, address book and calendar modules and performed data migration.
